settings.heading: JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
settings.confirmation_message: Thank you for signing up for our newsletter!

settings.title: CLINICALLY KIND™ FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
settings.text: It's skincare that’s clinically tested, scientifically proven, and made for sensitive skin (and sensitive people).

settings.newsletter_content: Be the first to hear about new products, events and exclusive content.
settings.confirmation_message: Thank you for signing up for our newsletter!

settings.title: Wrapped Up & Ready to Delight
settings.text: Whether you're sending a gift around the world or down the street, our perfectly packed gifts sets are the right gifts at the right price.

settings.hero_text_secondary: Using kindness as our guide, Beekman 1802 was built, neighbor by neighbor, on the foundation that a community that works together is also happier, healthier, stronger together.
settings.farm_text: The 219-year-old Beekman Farm is located in Sharon Springs, New York
settings.founders_text: Dr. Brent Ridge and Josh Kilmer - Purcell left their big city life and decamped to the Beekman farm in 2009.
settings.goats_text: They took in a neighboring farmer and his herd of goats and created their first skincare products using goat milk fresh from the farm
settings.milkmaidens_text: 15 million bars of goat soap later, it was time to turn our expertise into clinically kind skincare like no other.

settings.benefit_text1: Our clean skincare goes beyond labels and stamps of approvals (but we have those too). Our Kind formulas are allergy tested, cruelty-free and clinically proven to be safe for even the most sensitive skin.
settings.benefit_text2: Who says effective skincare has to be harsh? Made with nourishing goat milk and skin-balancing probiotics, our gentle-first formulas deliver visible results -without compromising your sensitive skin.
settings.benefit_text3: Keep it simple. Sensitive skin is complicated enough. Free your routine with a simple 3-step system made for sensitive skin and designed to reveal simply beautiful and healthy- looking skin.

settings.left-block-text: Creamy goat milk and botanicals deeply nourish and moisturize skin, giving you long lasting freshness. Completely fragrance free and perfect for sensitive skin.
settings.right-block-text: Triple-milled to last longer, extending all of the benefits of nourishing goat milk down to the very last lather.

settings.benefit_text1: Goat milk is high in lactic acid, a natural exfoliant, which makes it easier to purge pores for clear, beautiful skin.
settings.benefit_text2: The moisturizing qualities of fatty acids and triglycerides found in goat milk keep your skin baby soft.
settings.benefit_text3: Having a similar pH to human skin, goat milk balances the pH level of our own skin, which helps keep bacteria at bay.

settings.title: ARTISAN
settings.text:
Yes, we are a beauty company...
But, since the very beginning, we’ve also been dedicated to supporting local artisans. We showcase their passionately curated, one-of-a-kind, handcrafted items both online and in our Mercantile store. Each unique piece is locally sourced from our community of artisans, which supports over 300+ skilled makers and craftspeople.

settings.heroTitle: A Rose by Any Other Name...
settings.heroContent: Each of our Schitt's Creek inspired Rose Apothecary candles is artisan-made, hand-poured in upstate New York from 100% soy wax. Light it up and be instantly transported to a small town where rose, jasmine, and neroli blossom bloom and the characters are even more colorful than the flowers. While supplies last.

settings.left-block-text: Jamie Kim started Jamie's Farm through her long love of feeding people. Starting in high school, Jamie began exploring in the kitchen, making everything from scratch sourdoughs to homemade yogurts. But it was granola, a personal favorite snack, that led her to her current passion.
settings.right-block-text: This granola is given extra love with organic honey and homemade ghee so that everything comes up roses.

settings.heroTitle: THE STORY BEHIND OUR ARTISAN GOODS
settings.heroContent: Our community of artisans is what makes us stronger. It all started with our first bar of goat milk soap. Back in 2008, a local heritage soap maker masterfully hand-batched our first ever bar of soap from the confines of her own cottage, and from there we were introduced to a vibrant local community of talented craftspeople filled with passion and potential. Now, over 10 years later, this community of over 300 artisans are still at the heart of everything we do, and are the genius behind the 200+ handcrafted products you all have grown to love so much. Our neighbors (that’s you) have made a huge impact on our tiny rural economy. We thank you, and the artisans thank you.

A world-famous store in the middle of nowhere. Founded by Josh & Brent. Visit us at 187 Main Street, Sharon Springs,
New York. Our doors are open 7 days a week from 10AM-6PM.

settings.caption_text:
Brent
is a physician, co-founder of Beekman 1802, and television personality. He was formerly the Vice President of Healthy Living for Martha Stewart Omnimedia.
settings.quote: When life gives you lemons, you make lemonade. When life gives you goat milk, you change the world.

settings.caption_text: Josh is a writer, co-founder of Beekman 1802, and television personality. He's known for his New York Times and National bestselling memoirs; The Bucolic Plague and I Am Not Myself These Days.
settings.quote:
We believe that we'll never ever go wrong as long as we treat every single person
like they're our next-door neighbor.

settings.hero_text:
Beekman 1802 was born when our founders Josh and Dr. Brent moved to the historic Beekman 1802 farm in rural Sharon Springs, NY. There they found a tightknit community and 100 goats looking for a home. Next thing you know, they were making goat milk soap at the kitchen table.
They shared with Neighbors, and before long, stories started pouring in about the soap’s incredible effects. Upstate winters are hard, particularly on skin, but the soap cleared up one Neighbor’s eczema and another’s rosacea. Folks with sensitive skin raved.
Goat milk has been used for centuries as a natural remedy for sensitive skin—and the proof was on our Neighbors’ faces. Intrigued, Josh and Dr. Brent honed in on the science and discovered how it could be used as a powerfully effective ingredient for moisturizing, exfoliation, and nourishing your skin’s microbiome. Plus, it’s also safe and gentle on sensitive skin.
Neighbor by Neighbor, word spread—from soap to science to more skincare products. Beekman 1802 didn’t start out a beauty brand, but it became one—the world’s biggest goat-milk based skincare company, with millions of Beekman Neighbors who now have healthier, happier skin.
settings.connect_content: Josh and Brent would love to hear from you! ​​​​​​​Drop them a comment on their social media. They’re reading and posting on their accounts every day!
settings.appearances_content:
We’re glad you found us.
We hope you’ll swing by Sharon Springs one day and pay us a visit.
And if you’re interested in a collaboration, press appearance or book signing let us know in the
link below.

settings.carousel_text: Goat milk is high in lactic acid, a natural exfoliant, and makes it easier to purge pores for clear, beautiful skin.
The moisturizing qualities of fatty acids and triglycerides found in goat milk keep your skin baby soft.
With a similar pH to human skin it helps balance the pH level of our own skin and helps keep bacteria at bay.

settings.hero_text:
Watch Farmer John love and care for our 100 goats in real time, live from our farm in Sharon Springs, New York! John has spent the last decade on Beekman 1802 farm caring for our best milkers! Did you know that each new baby goat is named using the same first initial as their mama? Just like the Kardashians with Kris, Kylie, Kendall, Kim and Khloe– We’ve got Sue, Sarah, Sandy & Selena.

Due to our rural location, we lose power more frequently than most homes.
Camera interruptions may happen from time to time.
settings.video_text:
In addition to our own goats at the Beekman 1802 farm, we source our goat milk from 25 privately US owned family farms, owned by multiple generations of farmers.

These dairy goats are fed a balanced, vegetarian diet, which is full of nutrients, and free of antibiotics, hormones, animal by-products, and preservatives. They eat alfalfa hay, as well as a blend of grains including oats, barley, and corn. In addition, the goats receive almond hulls for fiber, salt blocks for digestion, and vitamin and mineral supplements for overall well-being. They also have plenty of fresh water on demand at all times.

At the farms, the goats have plenty of room to roam around during the day to both the inside and outside areas. Shelters provide protection from the seasonal elements such as extreme heat, cold, or rain.

Goats are very social animals, so our farmer partners make sure to keep them together, and provide them plenty of open space. It is important to note that these farms are regularly inspected by state and county agencies.

settings.title: MILK YOUR BEAUTY
settings.text: Get the most out of your beauty regimen with our signature goat milk products — from head-to-toe.

settings.title: MEET OUR ARTISANS
settings.description: Our community of artisans is what makes us stronger. It all started with our first bar of goat milk soap. Back in 2008, a local heritage soap maker masterfully hand-batched our first ever bar of soap from the confines of her own cottage, and from there we were introduced to a vibrant local community of talented craftspeople filled with passion and potential. Now, over 10 years later, this community of over 300 artisans are still at the heart of everything we do, and are the genius behind the 200+ handcrafted products you all have grown to love so much. Our neighbors (that’s you) have made a huge impact on our tiny rural economy. We thank you, and the artisans thank you.

settings.hero_statement: The Beekman 1802 Almanac is a quarterly publication that provides creative thinkers, artsy makers and culinary explorers with articles and inspiration based on seasonal living. Each issues features mix of curated content and editorial articles featuring recipes, living, beauty, wellness and behind-the-scenes at Beekman 1802.

settings.item_text:
Due to limiting fulfillment team members, please expect
orders to ship out within 4-5 business days.

settings.item_heading: How can I get in contact with Neighbor Services?
settings.item_text: Our Neighbor Services Team's hours are Monday through Friday, 9 am - 6 pm ET and Saturday/Sunday 9 am - 1 pm ET. Reach out to us by email at customerservice@beekman1802.com or by phone at (888) 801-1802.
We offer a flat $5 shipping charge for items being shipped within the continental USA. For orders outside of the continental USA or other countries, different shipping rates apply.
We sure do. You can place your order right on our website or give us a call at 888.801.1802 option 1 to place your order. Shipping rates to APOs are shipped via USPS priority.

At this time, we do not ship to Canada. If there is not a retailer partner near your home, be sure to request Beekman 1802 at your favorite gift shop, boutique or spa. 
 
You can also find many Beekman Beauty items on The Shopping Channel in Canada too.  
https://www.theshoppingchannel.com/

settings.item_heading: Can you hold my package for a later date?
settings.item_text: Unfortunately, we are not able to hold any orders unless there are extenuating circumstances like extreme weather events or emergencies.

We want every customer (or as we call you, our Neighbor) to be entirely thrilled with their Beekman 1802 purchase.  

We stand behind our goods and services and want Neighbors to be satisfied with them. We will always do our best to take care of our Neighbors – to deal with them fairly and reasonably and we hope that they will be fair and reasonable with us as well. 
 
If you are in anyway dissatisfied, please contact our customer service team at customerservice@beekman1802.com, or call us at 1-888-801-1802. We accept returns for 30 days from date of delivery.  
 
We and our artisans care deeply about ensuring that our products are in perfect condition. If you find flaws in our products and request a refund, we ask that you either return the product and/or send us a clear photo so we know what happened and can prevent it from happening again.  
 
Unless defective, beauty products, food items and bedding cannot be returned once opened.

settings.item_heading: My tracking number states my package was delivered but it isn't here.
settings.item_text: Thank you for reaching out to us. Sometimes at the end of the day, the mail carriers will mark the packages they did not have the time to deliver as delivered. They are typically delivered within the next 1-2 business days. Please let us know once it arrives.

settings.item_heading: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.item_text: B.1802 accepts all major credit cards, PayPal, ApplePay and Beekman 1802 e-gift cards on our website. We also offer interest-free installments through Afterpay. Over the telephone, we can accept all major credit cards and Beekman 1802 E-Gift Cards.

settings.item_heading: What happens if my payment is declined?
settings.item_text: If you are placing an order on our website and your card is declined, please double check to make sure all of the information is entered accurately. If the trouble persists, give us a call at 888.801.1802 option 1. We’re open Monday through Friday from 9am-5pm EST.

settings.item_heading: How do I know my order was placed?
settings.item_text:
Once your order is completed on Beekman1802.com, we will email you an order confirmation to the email address provided during the ordering process. The order confirmation may end up in your junk or spam folders.  
Don’t see your order confirmation email, email our Neighbor Services Team at customerservice@beekman1802.com. We will be happy to look the order up. 

Once our warehouse ships your package, we will send you a shipment confirmation with a tracking number.

settings.item_heading: I placed my order. Why did I receive an email reminding me to place my order?
settings.item_text:
The reminder email is automatically generated if an item remains in the shopping cart. If you placed an order and received the email after your order was complete, this is because the browser you were using did not recognize the order being processed. You can ignore these emails.  

Feel free to email us at customerservice@beekman1802.com to verify your order was processed okay.

settings.item_heading: How do I send a gift?
settings.item_text:
1. When you place an order for a gift use the "Add to Cart" button.   
2. Be sure to add your gift note to the order while in the initial shopping cart section. 
3. At checkout, add the recipient's information in the shipping address location and then during billing add your information. 
4. If the billing address isn't perfect, it's OK.  The recipient will not receive a bill. 
5. Complete purchase and then have an amazing day!

settings.item_heading: Are your products made in America?
settings.item_text: 100% of our Beauty products are made in the USA. A lot of our artisan pieces are made within 100 miles from Sharon Springs.

settings.item_heading: What is the Beekman 1802 mailing address?
settings.item_text:
The Beekman 1802 mailing address is: 
Beekman 1802  
PO Box 325 
Sharon Springs NY 13459

settings.item_heading: Where is the Beekman 1802 Sharon Springs Mercantile?
settings.item_text: The Mercantile is located at 187 Main Street in Sharon Springs, NY 13459. We are open 7 days a week from 10 AM- 6 PM (except Christmas, Thanksgiving & New Years.)

The farm is open occasionally for tours. Please sign up for our email newsletter for announcements on future tours. Because Beekman 1802 Farm is a private residence and working farm, we must restrict access to Farm Tour dates only.

settings.contact_block_content: Was your question not answered here?  Feel free to reach out to our Neighbor Services team.

settings.item_text:
We want every customer (or as we call you, Neighbor) to be entirely thrilled with their Beekman 1802 purchase. But if you’re not thrilled, we are happy to accept returns from purchases made at Beekman1802.com or from the Beekman 1802 Mercantile in Sharon Springs, NY.

The return policy below relates to any applicable orders purchased directly from beekman1802.com. Items purchased from retail partners, including independent retailers, are excluded from the beekman1802.com return policy.

Beekman 1802 accepts returns of unopened items purchased directly from beekman1802.com within 30 days of the delivery date. To start the return process with Beekman 1802, reach out to customerservice@beekman1802.com. The Neighbor Services Team will email you a shipping label to print off and provide you with a return authorization number.

Return shipping costs are a $5 flat rate and will be deducted from your final refund. Beekman 1802 does not pay for return shipping. Upon receipt of your return to Beekman 1802, refunds will be processed within 3 business days. Once processed, refunds will be reflected in the account used to place the original order within 10 business days.

Refunds processed with AfterPay will receive a separate email from AfterPay with details on the refund and cancellation of the payment plan.

If you return your item before contacting Neighbor Services, you may incur an extended timetable to process the refund. Items returned without a Beekman 1802 issued label will be shipped at the Neighbor’s expense and will not receive the $5 flat fee.

• Currently, we do not offer exchanges.

• Refunds will reflect the purchase price and applicable sales tax of the item returned minus the flat shipping charge.

• Original shipping charges are non-refundable.

• Beekman 1802 will not accept returns on partial gift sets, totes bundles, and other multi-product bundles. Only full, unopened sets/bundles can be returned for a refund.

• Opened items that are returned to Beekman 1802 will not be refunded.

• Beekman 1802 is not responsible for lost or misplaced returns from the carrier. If you’re concerned an item was lost in transit, please reach out to Neighbor Services with your tracking number.

• Beekman 1802 is not responsible for personal damages to an item. If the item has been dropped, stolen, spilled, misused, etc., we cannot refund or accept a return.

• Other terms and conditions may apply.

Returning items to the Mercantile The return policy below relates to any applicable orders purchased directly from the Sharon Springs Mercantile. Retail partners, including independent retailers, are excluded from the Sharon Springs Mercantile return policy. Sharon Springs Mercantile purchases can be returned to the Sharon Springs Mercantile and via mail following the beekman1802.com return policy.

Beekman1802.com purchases may be returned to the Sharon Springs Mercantile. An order number from beekman1802.com will be required to process the return.

Retail Partner Return Policy

Beekman 1802 items purchased from other retailers, including TV Shopping Retail Partners, should be returned to the original retailer within the terms set forth by the retail partner’s return policy. Beekman 1802 and the Beekman 1802 Mercantile are not able to process returns, exchanges or product replacements from purchases made with other retailers.

Express Shipping is available Monday-Friday for most products in the continental US and carries an additional charge with two-day ($30) and overnight ($50) options available.

Orders shipped via Express and 2-Day Shipping typically ship out within one full business day.

We ship Monday-Friday from our warehouse; weekend and holiday deliveries are excluded.

PERIODIC SUBSCRIPTION RENEWAL AMOUNTS WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY CHARGED TO YOUR CARD ON FILE EACH PERIOD (MONTHLY, QUARTERLY, ETC). 
As authorized by you when placing your order, Beekman 1802 will automatically renew your subscription on a periodic basis (depending on the subscription you choose).  We will charge the applicable subscription amount to the payment method you chose during the initial order process.

You may cancel your subscription at any time by logging on to your account page on Beekman1802.com. Cancellations (via your account page on the Beekman1802.com website) must be received at least one full calendar day prior to the next recharge date to avoid being charged for that shipment. Cancellation requests received after that shall take effect the following period.

settings.hero_subheading: We accept returns for 30 days from date of delivery.
settings.hero_text:
Flat $5.00 standard ground shipping is offered for all orders in continental USA.

Expected delivery for Standard Shipping is 3-5 business days from the time the order is shipped.

Due to COVID precautions at our warehouse and high order volume, it may take longer to process and ship your order. Most orders ship within 4-5 business days.

We ship Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm EST; weekends or US holidays do not count as business days. We ship most US orders via FedEx or USPS.
settings.contact_block_content: Have any other questions concerning our shipping & returns policies? Please contact our Neighbor Services team.

settings.caption_text: William Beekman built his “mansion” for his wife, Joanna, and their 10 children in 1802. In addition to owning the farm, he also ran a successful onsite mercantile. He was known as such a “fair” man that he  was appointed the county’s first judge.

Our flower garden was designed to seamlessly blend both modern and heirloom varieties, with a special emphasis on botanical ingredients for skincare. Many of the specimens have been propagated for several centuries.
Josh & Brent’s favorite spot to sit on the farm, the pond offers the most glowing view of the house, barn & goats at sunset.
We grow almost 100% of our food from over 108 varieties of heirloom fruits and vegetables. All crops are grown completely organically and with non-gmo seeds.

The stately Sugar Maple trees that line the front of the Beekman house were likely planted when the home was first built in 1802. They’ve proudly stood through 200 years of changing seasons, nesting birds and playing children.
While the farm itself is over 200 years old, the barn was built in the early 1900s. Originally built as a cow dairy barn, now it’s home to Farmer John’s 100+ goats.
The bees in our 42 hives help pollinate all 59 acres of the farm’s organically managed pastures and gardens. The raw honey they produce goes into many of our products.

settings.bookings_content: Be sure to sign up for our emails to stay updated with upcoming farm tour dates.
settings.history_content: The history of this farm is the history of William Beekman, who built the farm in 1802. He was orphaned at sea, a child soldier in the Revolutionary War, and a businessman who grew his business with such integrity that he rose from humble beginnings to be the first judge of Schoharie County and a Senator—all without any formal education.

settings.section_text: Starting with a herd of 100 goats and a community of Neighbors, Beekman 1802 unlocked the science behind goat milk—a centuries-old natural remedy for sensitive skin—and grew from one bar of soap into the world’s biggest goat-milk skincare company.

Clinically Kind For Sensitive Skin™ is the Beekman 1802 approach to skincare that’s clinically tested, scientifically proven, and made for sensitive skin (and sensitive people). Effective clean formulations that work with your skin, not against it.

In addition to the 100 goats at the Beekman 1802 farm in Sharon Springs, NY, we source our goat milk from 25 privately US owned family farms, owned by multiple generations of farmers.

LEARN MORE

Our Neighbor Recycling Program provides a completely free, zero-waste and accessible way to upcycle all of our packaging. Just download a label, ship your empties to Terracyle (we pay for it), and they will turn them into new products…like Adirondack chairs.

LEARN MORE

settings.video_heading: Beekman 1802: Kind to Planet Neighbor Recycling Program
settings.video_text:
You shouldn’t have to simply throw away the packaging of your favorite products when you’re done with them. Our new sustainability initiative provides a completely free and accessible alternative to traditional recycling, by which Terracycle upcycles your empties and box packaging into brand new products! Old box packaging, empty hand cream tubes, jars, and even bottles can all be upcycled in three simple steps!

  Step 1: Register – Visit terracycle.com today and sign up! It’s completely free of charge!

  Step 2: Collect – Grab any shipping box you have and toss in your empties.

  Step 3: Send – When you are ready, simply download a shipping label straight from your account on terracycle.com, place it on the box, and mail it in for recycling!  

Bonus: Program participants can earn points for recycling and redeem those points for charitable donations.

settings.item_text:
SKU: HPCLCU

Ingredients:

Water, alkylpolyglycosides (detergent, foaming), tetrahydrofurfuryl alcohol (grease solubilizer), diisopropanolamides (detergent), sodium bicarbonate (deodorizer), cocoamidopropyl betaine (detergent), polyoxyethylene sorbitan monolaurate (solubilizer), sodium gluconate (chelating agent), triethanolamine (grease solubizer, pH buffer), phenoxyethanol (preservative), fragrance.

Safety Data Sheet

SKU: HPCLDS-SG

Ingredients:

Water, tetrahydrofurfuryl alcohol (grease solubilizer), alkyloxypropylamine oxides (low-foam detergent), citric acid (chelating agent), sodium gluconate (chelating agent), polyoxyethylene sorbitan monolaurate (solubilizer), sodium carboxymethylcellulose (thickener), phenoxyethanol (preservative)

settings.heroContent: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam.

settings.hero_text: Did you know 60-70% of Americans have sensitive skin?

settings.certified_text: Clinically Kind™ is the Beekman 1802 approach to skincare that’s clinically tested, scientifically proven, and made for sensitive skin (and sensitive people). Effective clean formulations that work with your skin, not against it.

settings.tile1Text: External Elements: The most common things that cause a sensitive skin reaction are heat, cold, stress, sun exposure, pollution, wind, chemicals, and fragrances.
settings.tile2Text: Warning Signs: If you have sensitive skin you may experience uncomfortable sensations like redness, itchiness, breakouts or dryness
settings.tile3Text: Product Usage: Layering too many products, exfoliating too intensely, or using formulas with harsh ingredients can lead to increased skin sensitivity

settings.title_desc: Click below to learn more about our 3 Codes of Clinically-Kind for Sensitive Skin
settings.main_text_section1: Clinically Kind™ products are free of toxins and the harsh ingredients known to irritate sensitive skin. But you don’t have to take our word for it. Our formulations meet the clean beauty standards of every major retailer and have received numerous third-party certifications. They’ve also undergone rigorous clinical testing to ensure that they’re highly effective and safe for sensitive skin—the best of both worlds.
settings.title_desc1_section1: Here’s what you won’t find in any Clinically Kind formula:
settings.text_desc1_section1: parabens, sulfates, phthalates, synthetic colors and fragrances, abrasive exfoliant particles or microplastics, and severe actives like retinol and benzoyl peroxide.
settings.text_desc2_section1: Such ingredients do more than trigger allergic reactions; they also strip skin of its natural defenses and disrupt the balance of the microbiome, causing an ongoing cycle of damage.
settings.text_desc3_section1: The proof is in the results of our 8-week scientific and consumer trials, which yielded ZERO allergic reactions or sensitivity flareups—and real results. Nearly all (90% or more) participants reported that their skin was softer, smoother, healthier, and more radiant after using a Clinically Kind™ product.
settings.main_text_section2: Instead of quick chemical fixes that can compromise sensitive complexions, our Clinically Kind™ line relies on nourishing goat milk and active probiotic cultures to ensure skin’s long-term health and a balanced microbiome. Think of our gentle formulas as yogurt for your skin.
settings.text_desc1_section2: Though most people have heard that probiotics promote gut health, few are aware that these “good bacteria” benefit skin, too—by restoring the natural microbiome which serves as skin’s first defense against external irritants, and also encourages collagen synthesis and cell turnover.
settings.text_desc2_section2: Our Bloom Cream Moisturizer, Milk Drops Ceramide Serum, Dewy Eyed Depuffing Eye Serum, and Pure Face Wipes are the ONLY products at Ulta—of more than 25,000 products by 500-plus brands—to be certified “microbiome friendly” by MyMicrobiomeAG.
settings.text_desc3_section2: The ideal delivery system for these microbiome-balancing probiotics? Goat milk, of course. Beekman 1802’s signature ingredient has the same pH as human skin and is also high in lactic acid, a gentle exfoliator that prepares pores to receive the microbiome-balancing benefits of probiotics.
settings.main_text_section3: Sensitive skin is complicated enough. Your skincare routine shouldn’t require a medicine cabinet’s worth of products or a user manual. In fact, doing too much can work against you, by disrupting the skin’s natural microbiome. Our Clinically Kind system relies on only three must-have products—plus a few optional extras.
settings.text_desc1_section3: Our Milk Wash Exfoliating Jelly Cleanser removes even water-resistant makeup and gently exfoliates with lactic acid, not abrasive scrubs, leaving sensitive skin soft and silky, instead of dry and tight.
settings.text_desc2_section3: After cleansing, apply a few drops of our potent Milk Drops Probiotic Ceramide Serum, then follow with our lightweight, fast-absorbing Bloom Cream Daily Probiotic Moisturizer—a one-two probiotic punch that balances sensitive skin’s microbiome for long-term health.
settings.text_desc3_section3: Of course we understand that even beauty minimalists might enjoy a “Home-Spa Sunday” from time to time—and that eyes and lips often demand special treatment. Sensitive types can rest assured that our masks, depuffing eye serum, and lip serum won’t overcleanse, overtreat, or irritate skin.

settings.hero_heading: Clinically Kind™ Skincare For Sensitive Skin

settings.heroDescription: Let us calculate how many people your act of Kindness will impact...and then let us pay for it!

settings.section-description:
Beekman 1802 believes that there is beauty in Kindness. We are committed to helping Neighbors be Kind to their skin, Kind to themselves, Kind to their community and Kind to the Earth. Research shows that acts of Kindness can improve ones health, and we all know that they can improve the health of your Neighborhood.

Do you want to spread Kindness?

Whether you’re looking to get art supplies for your classroom or to help local nurses with a lunch, or drive an elderly Neighbor to a doctor’s appointment, we want to help make that happen!

settings.list-item1-text: Think of an act of Kindness we can help you perform that can make the greatest impact for $500 or less.
settings.list-item2-text: Fill out and submit the questionnaire below. Tell us how your Kindness act can cause a Kindness ripple effect!
settings.list-item3-text: The grant cycle happens monthly.  There are lots of submissions, so if you don’t get selected this month, please submit again next month.

settings.section-heading: What Act of Kindness Can We Help You Accomplish?
settings.section-description: Submit your idea in the simple questionnaire below.  When you hit submit, our proprietary calculator will estimate the ripple effect of your single act of Kindness.

settings.effectNote: Your act of kindness could effect:

settings.section-terms-text: All contributions are by Beekman 1802 in its discretion. Beekman 1802 reserves the right to determine which organizations and acts of kindness to support. No guarantee is made that any particular organization or proposed act of kindness will be funded. No portion of any contribution is tax-deductible to the person proposing the act of kindness. If fewer than the expected number of eligible proposals are received, Beekman 1802 may apply the unused funds toward the general projects of the Kindness Fund.

settings.heroDescription: Not sure which of our signature fragrances is best for you? Explore our farm inspired fragrances based on a variety of scent notes and strengths and find the one you love.

settings.scentDescription: Drag the slider to the scent strength of your liking to view recommended scents.
